name: Button-Matrix
prompt:
Design a VibeDeck controller as a button-matrix device inspired by Elgato Stream Deck.

Features:
- 4x3 grid of LCD buttons (12 buttons total), each showing customizable icons/text
- Small OLED status bar at top showing current mode
- Compact rectangular form factor, sits flat on desk
- USB-C connection with detachable cable
- Subtle RGB underglow around edges
- Matte black aluminum housing with rounded corners
- Each LCD button approximately 1 inch square

Style: Professional product photography, clean studio lighting, 45-degree angle view, neutral gray background. Device should fill 70% of frame. Modern, premium tech aesthetic like Apple or Elgato products.
design_rationale: Stream Deck is the dominant product in this space. Testing if VibeDeck should adopt a similar button-matrix approach for familiarity and proven UX.
